sent.orig: HIM will not be held responsible for any extracurricular activities undertaken by students out of school-hours.
sent.trans: HIM不会负任何责任对于学生不在上课时进行的课外活动。

sent.orig: For four seasons they have tolerated him, humored him, teased him, goaded him, pushed him.
sent.trans: 这四个赛季里，他们容忍他的一切，开他玩笑，逗他，鼓舞他，鞭策他。

sent.orig: Take him and look after him; don't harm him but do for him whatever he asks.
sent.trans: 你领他去、好好的看待他、切不可害他．他对你怎麽说、你就向他怎麽行。

sent.orig: They stroked him and told him they loved him and wished him peace.
sent.trans: 他们边抚摸着他边说，他们爱他，希望他平安无事。

sent.orig: Mk. 12:3 And they took him and beat him and sent him away empty-handed.
sent.trans: 可十二3园户拿住他，打了他，叫他空手回去。
